properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the shadow in pixels

properties.name: direction
properties.description: The direction of the shadow defined by the angle it creates. Must be specified in degrees, in the interval [0-360[

properties.name: blur
properties.description: How much the shadow should be blurred expressed in pixels

properties.name: color
properties.description: The color of the shadow expressed in hex

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Opacity of the shadow. 0 is transparent and 1 is opaque.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value that should be propagated by the event

properties.name: accessibleLabel
properties.description: Text to read for screen readers

properties.name: isHeader
properties.description: Tells the screen reader that this is a title

properties.name: role
properties.description: Tells the screen reader the role of this component. Please look for aria-role in W3C for more details.
